p: Contents of heavy metals (copper, zinc, and chromium) were determined by atomic absorption spectrophotometer (AAS7000, SHIMADZU, Japan), with pretreatment of digesting by nitric acid, hydrofluoric acid, and hydrogen peroxide system (5 : 2 : 1 by volume), respectively, in microwave digestion instrument [ 20]. Contents of TPHs were measured using a Purge & Trap Sample Concentrator (Eclipse 4660, OI, USA) combined with GC (7890A with FID detector, Agilent Technologies) [ 21].
